text: Ó tún wà nínú àwọn Lárúbáwá oko, ẹni tí ó gbàgbọ́ nínú Allāhu àti Ọjọ́ Ìkẹ́yìn, tí ó sì sọ ìnáwó t’ó ń ná (fún ẹ̀sìn) di àwọn ìsúnmọ́ Allāhu àti (gbígba) àdùá (lọ́dọ̀) Òjíṣẹ́. Kíyè sí i, dájúdájú òhun ni ìsúnmọ́ Allāhu fún wọn. Allāhu yó sì fi wọ́n sínú ìkẹ́ Rẹ̀. Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Aláforíjìn, Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run
